pr_title: SQL: handle MIN and MAX functions on dates in Painless scripts

timeline.message:
Convert to date/datetime the result of numeric aggregations (min, max)
in Painless scripts

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we remove this method as currently there is no such case that a groupingfunction (actually histogram) results into a script?
timeline.author: matriv

replies.bodyText: Chose to keep it there since, before the bug was introduced, the code was using asDateTime for grouping functions, as well.
replies.author: astefan

replies.bodyText: Would you mind adding a comment then, please, to avoid pursuing it again in the future?
